page.title: 19LIFE IN DOBWALLS
page.content: IN DOBWALLS PEOPLE RARELY LOCK BOTH THEIR DOORS. EVERYONE USED TO KNOW EVERYONE ELSE,AND STILL TRIES TO. IT IS IN MANY WAYS A WARM AND FRIENDLY, IF NOSY, PLACE TO LIVE. IT IS ALSO VERY CONFORMIST. PEOPLE WHO DIFFER IN IDEAS APPEARANCE OR ASPIRATIONS ARE VERY NOTICEABLE. THAT CAN MAKE IT AN UNCOMFORTABLE PLACE TO BE. THIS IS THE FIRST PLACE I HAVE LIVED WHERE I AM A WOMAN FIRST AND A HUMAN BEING SECOND. I AM REGARDED BY SOME AS AN ARDENT FEMINIST. I AM NOT. I AM MOVING NEXT YEAR. THERE ARE PEOPLE I WILL MISS GREATLY, AND THERE IS GREAT PLEASURE TO BE HAD LIVING IN AN AREA OF SUCH BEAUTY, BUT I LOOK FORWARD TO MUCH GREATER FREEDOM AND OPPORTUNITY, WHEN I LIVE IN LONDON.
